name: Simulate Sensors
func:
msg.payload = {
    idUser: 2,
    idDoor1: 1,
    idDoor2: 2,
    idWindow1: 1,
    idWindow2: 2,
    window1: Math.random() > 0.5 ? "opened" : "closed",
    window2: Math.random() > 0.5 ? "opened" : "closed",
    door1: Math.random() > 0.5 ? "opened" : "closed",
    door2: Math.random() > 0.5 ? "opened" : "closed",
    water: Math.random() > 0.5 ? "alert" : "stoped",
    motion: Math.random() > 0.5 ? "motion detected" : "motion stoped",
    smoke: Math.random() > 0.5 ? "alert" : "stoped",
    timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
};
return msg;
